comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: This might be an interesting picture, but has it been bleached almost completely or has something been gone wrong with the scanning ?

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/varese2002] This is how the original was.  I can send you the original file and you can play with color corrections?
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives

comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives] I would be delighted to have a go at it and help you out. Perhaps this is the most 'shady' one of the set but there are some others in the series, which are just the same or a little better. I don't know how best to send the original files, but it could perhaps be done via the mail in Flickr. Otherwise I will send my email address in a safe way. I will do my best to unearth as much as possible.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/varese2002] Feel free to email me at arenga@sdasm.org and I can send you the file!
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
